0.text: Innate: Morgana  heals herself for 18% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by her abilities against  champions, large  minions, and medium and large  monsters.
0.html: Innate: Morgana heals herself for 18% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by her abilities against champions, large minions, and medium and large monsters.
markedPassages: heals
champions
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and roots them for a duration.
markedPassages: roots

0.text: Passive: Tormented Shadow's  current cooldown is reduced by 5% of its total cooldown whenever  Soul Siphon triggers. Simultaneous triggers from multiple targets will stack the cooldown reduction.
0.html: Passive: Tormented Shadow's  current cooldown is reduced by 5% of its total cooldown whenever Soul Siphon triggers. Simultaneous triggers from multiple targets will stack the cooldown reduction.
markedPassages: current cooldown
Soul Siphon

1.text: Active: Morgana torments the soil at the target location, causing the area to become desecrated for 5 seconds. Enemies within take magic damage on-cast and every 0.5 seconds, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Shadow deals 155% damage against  monsters.
1.html: Active: Morgana torments the soil at the target location, causing the area to become desecrated for 5 seconds. Enemies within take magic damage on-cast and every 0.5 seconds, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Shadow deals 155% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health)
monsters

0.text: Active: Morgana grants a  shield to the target allied  champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs incoming magic damage and grants  crowd control immunity while it holds.
0.html: Active: Morgana grants a shield to the target allied champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs incoming magic damage and grants crowd control immunity while it holds.
markedPassages: shield
champion
crowd control immunity

0.text: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a  tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are  revealed and  slowed by 20%.
0.html: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are revealed and slowed by 20%.
markedPassages: tether
revealed
slowed

1.text: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed while facing enemies tethered to her.
1.html: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed while facing enemies tethered to her.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

2.text: If a target does not break their tether by the ends of its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again and become  stunned for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
2.html: If a target does not break their tether by the ends of its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again and become stunned for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: stunned
revealed

3.text: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.
3.html: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be tethered by this ability.
